content.rendered:
Now Hiring

We are looking for full- and part-time help as we continue to grow. We are gearing up for the Christmas rush, opening new bookstores, and maintaining an ever-expanding warehouse operation. We are looking for highly motivated staffers to come on board! Gottwals Books is an honest and fair employer, and we value each and every employee.

‘Tis the Season for Some Readin’

Come and explore our Christmas book selections. Novels, crafts, picture books, cookbooks, and more–all featuring our favorite holiday! We have hundreds of Christmas titles available at every Gottwals Books location. We will be adding to the selection each week, so there will continually be something new to see. Many of these are in new condition, so they will make great gifts.

 

 

 

 

Santa’s Sleigh is available at all Gottwals Books locations for only $7.97!

Melissa & Doug 3-D Coloring

Check out our new 3-D activity pads! Watch the images come alive. Simply color the pictures and play with the stickers. Then, use the glasses to see the images transform before your eyes. Click on the photos below for more information!
